title: Watch Face Scoon Spitfire
summary: HD animated Spitfire in 3D shooting up your dial. The ultimate pilot watch!
description: Scoon Spitfire is made with 3D rendering software to give you the ultimate smart watch experience using the full capability of your Android Wear watch. All items are made with 3D software and rendered with the same enviroment of the Spitfire. This gives you matching realistic reflections and materials.Features:- HD animation of attacking Spitfire- Color hue of animation can be changed (!)- Analog pilot hands. Color can be set.- Different marker materials and styles. Color hue can be changed- Different back dial materials and styles. Color hue can be changed- Analog and digital watch power/ phone power and date dials- Digital time indicator can be set- Weather temperature and atmosphere dial can be activated- Flying spitfire that moves when you tilt your wrist on accelerator functions- You can even configure ambient mode!
descriptionHTML:
Scoon Spitfire is made with 3D rendering software to give you the ultimate smart watch experience using the full capability of your Android Wear watch. All items are made with 3D software and rendered with the same enviroment of the Spitfire. This gives you matching realistic reflections and materials.

Features:
- HD animation of attacking Spitfire
- Color hue of animation can be changed (!)
- Analog pilot hands. Color can be set.
- Different marker materials and styles. Color hue can be changed
- Different back dial materials and styles. Color hue can be changed
- Analog and digital watch power/ phone power and date dials
- Digital time indicator can be set
- Weather temperature and atmosphere dial can be activated
- Flying spitfire that moves when you tilt your wrist on accelerator functions
- You can even configure ambient mode!
